public class ShibHeaderAuthnMod
extends BaseAuthnMod
implements AuthenticationModule, Configurable

Method Detail

initAuthenticationContext

public void initAuthenticationContext(AuthenticationContext authCtx,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                               throws AuthenticationException
provides authentication context with data looked up from given requests shibboleth-SP http header attributes initialize the given authentication context with the proper data NOTE: this method should internally already call AuthenticationModule.initSubject(AuthenticationContext, HttpServletRequest)

Specified by:
initAuthenticationContext in interface AuthenticationModule
Parameters:
authCtx - AuthenticationContext to be filled with proper data
request - current request
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if lookup of proper data fails

initSubject

public javax.security.auth.Subject initSubject(AuthenticationContext authCtx,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                        throws AuthenticationException
provides principal/subject with data looked up from given requests shibboleth-SP http header attributes updates or initializes (if null yet) the given authentication context's Subject with the proper user

Specified by:
initSubject in interface AuthenticationModule
Parameters:
authCtx - AuthenticationContext to update/init its Subject
request - current request
Returns:
the new/updated Subject
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if lookup or init of user/subject data failed
